ChunkText: mail your application to: for regular mail: uscis po box 660867 dallas, tx 75266 for express mail, courier or tracked shipments: uscis attn: aos 2501 s. state hwy. 121 business suite 400 lewisville, tx 75067
ContextBefore: if the circumstances involve a sponsor, please also include documentation of the specific person acting as your sponsor, such as the initial letter of financial support and bank statement provided to isss when your I-20 was first made. once you have prepared all the items listed above, make a complete copy of the application for your records.
